resource.name: Metro Nashville Police Department Active Dispatch
resource.description: Current active major incident calls for service received by the Emergency Communications Center dispatched to Metro Nashville Police Department. Updated approximately every 15 minutes.
resource.attribution: Metro Nashville Police Department, Information Technology
columns_description: City, precinct, or neighborhood where the call occurred
Date and time the call was answered by the ECC
Street address where the call occurred
Date and time the call status was last updated
Text description of the Incident Type Code
Additional location information for the call, if applicable
Abbreviated codes ("tencodes") used to represent common phrases describing the call

resource.name: Nashville Fire Department Active Incidents
resource.description: A summary of active incidents under current response from the Nashville Fire Department.
columns_description: Identifier for the incident
ZIP code of the incident
Identifier for units dispatched to the incident
Code for type of incident
Date and time of the dispatch

metadata.license: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License

resource.name: General Government Employees Titles and Base Annual Salaries
resource.description: Metro Nashville general government employees’ titles and base annual salaries.
columns_description: Classification title of employee
Employee status description
Employee name (Last, First M)
Annual base salary of the employee
Department to which the employee belongs

resource.name: Building Permits Issued
resource.description: Details of building permits approved and issued by Metro Codes over a rolling three-year period.
columns_description: The Assessor’s Parcel Number (APN) for the property the permit is issued for
Full text description of the permit type
Permit number
Metro Nashville council district number for the parcel
Legal description of the parcel for the permit
Contact person for the permit, usually the contractor
Stated value of the construction
Full text description of the permit subtype
ZIP Code of the parcel for the permit
Geocoded point location of the parcel with latitude and longitude for mapping purposes
State of the parcel for the permit
City of the parcel for the permit
The census tract information for the property
Unique identifier for the permit
Short version of the permit type description
The stated purpose of the permit, which may contain boilerplate language appropriate for each permit type
Date the permit was applied for
Date the permit was approved and issued
Street address of the parcel for the permit

resource.name: Metro Nashville Police Department Calls for Service
resource.description: Details about emergency and non-emergency calls for Metro Nashville Police Department service received by the Emergency Communications Center.
resource.attribution: Metro Nashville Police Department, Information Technology
columns_description: Abbreviated codes used to provide additional information about the call beyond the tencode
Text description of the call’s tencode
Rounded block number for the call
MNPD zone / patrol area for the call
MNPD reporting zone for the call
Text description of the call’s tencode suffix
Text description of the disposition code
Date and time the call was answered by the ECC
Code used to describe the outcome of the call

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council District Outlines (GIS)' (p6sk-2acq) the point in column 'mapped_location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Zip Codes (GIS)' (gxvr-9jxz) the point in column 'mapped_location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
MNPD precinct assigned to the call
MNPD incident number for the call, if an incident is generated for the call
Abbreviated codes used to represent common phrases used to describe the call
Rounded longitude for the call
Rounded latitude for the call
Callsign of the officer responding to the call
Street name where the call occurred

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Davidson County Border (GIS)' (wvby-4s8j) the point in column 'mapped_location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Service Districts (GIS)' (3aw5-2wv7) the point in column 'mapped_location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: Residential Short Term Rental Permits
resource.description: Current and historical details of Short Term Rental Property (STRP) applications and issued permits since the beginning of the program.
columns_description: Owner city as entered on the permit
City of the property
Date the permit was applied for
Owner address 1 as entered on the permit
Identifier of the permit
Date the permit was approved and issued
Full text description of the permit subtype
Owner name as entered on the permit
Geocoded point location of the property with latitude and longitude for mapping purposes
Census tract of the parcel
Date the permit expired, if applicable
Owner state as entered on the permit
Owner address 3 as entered on the permit
ZIP Code of the property
Current status of the permit
Legal description of the parcel
System code of the permit subtype
State of the property

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council District Outlines (2023)' (kdqx-a6fv) the point in column 'mapped_location' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
Street address of the property
Contains boilerplate language for Short Term Rental Property permits along with additional permit comments, if provided
Owner address 2 as entered on the permit
Owner ZIP Code as entered on the permit
Metro Council district number of the property
The Assessor’s Parcel Number (APN) for the property
Name of the permit contact
Name of the applicant applying for the permit
System code of the permit type

resource.name: Davidson County Election Results
resource.description: Unofficial results for multiple Davidson County elections over time. (Use the Filter option by Election Date to limit results to a single election. Results may be delayed during elections.)
columns_description: Number of in-person election day votes for this candidate or issue in the contest
Numerical identifier of the contest
Number of precincts that have reported results in this contest
Number of absentee votes for this candidate or issue in the contest
Total number of precincts for this contest
Date and time of the last update to this data
Number of early votes for this candidate or issue in the contest
Numerical identifier used to determine row order based on candidate or issue name
Unique identifier for each election
Description of election type
Date the election was held
Unique identifier for each record derived from Election ID and Candidate Row ID
Name of candidate or issue
The race, amendment, etc.
Total number of votes for this candidate or issue in the contest

resource.name: Metro Government Employee Earnings
resource.description: Details of earnings paid to employees on the Metro general government payroll per fiscal year, broken down by type of pay.
columns_description: Payouts amount
Longevity pay amount
Supplemental pay amount
Overtime pay amount
Regular pay amount
Classification title of employee
Home business unit of the employee as of the date the data is generated
Bonus pay amount
Amount of any other type of pay
Total payroll amount paid to the employee during the noted fiscal year
Fiscal year for the payroll amount paid to the employee
Employee name (Last, First M)

resource.name: Property Standards Violations
resource.description: Details of property standards violations reported to Metro Codes over a rolling three-year period.
columns_description: Complaint request number
Metro Nashville council district number for the property
General description of the reported violation (this is only what was initially reported, not what was found)
Geocoded point location of the property with latitude and longitude for mapping purposes
Status of the most recent action taken by Metro Codes regarding this complaint
ZIP Code of the property reported in the complaint
Specific property standards violations noted by Metro Codes during inspection
Listed owner of the property reported in the complaint
Method by which the violation was reported, such as phone, walk-in, or online
The Assessor’s Property Number (APN) for the property reported in the complaint
Current status of the complaint
State of the property reported in the complaint
The most recent activity by Metro Codes regarding this complaint
Date the most recent action was taken by Metro Codes regarding this complaint
City of the property reported in the complaint
Street address of the property reported in the complaint
Date the complaint was received

resource.name: Traffic Accidents
resource.description: Details about traffic accidents reported to Metro Nashville Police Department.
resource.attribution: Metro Nashville Police Department, Information Technology
columns_description: System code indicating harmful objects or conditions present in the accident
MNPD reporting zone in which the accident occurred
Street address at which the accident occurred
Date and time of the accident
City in which the accident occurred
Approximate longitude where the accident occurred
System code for the weather conditions at the time of the accident
MNPD incident number for the crash
Full text description of the collision type
ID number of the officer responding to the accident
Full text description of the harmful objects or conditions
Full text description of the lighting conditions
Approximate latitude where the accident occurred
Number of vehicles involved in the accident
Combined latitude and longitude for the accident for mapping purposes
Assigned MNPD precinct in which the accident occurred
ZIP Code in which the accident occurred
State in which the accident occurred
System code for the type of collision
Indicates if the accident was a hit and run
Indicates if there was property damage as a result of the accident
Number of people with injuries as a result of the accident
System code for type of lighting at the time of the accident
Number of fatalities as a result of the accident
Full text description of the weather conditions

resource.description: Metro vendor payments for the indicated monthly period.

resource.name: Police Precincts
resource.description: A current list of all Metro Police Precincts, their Commanders, phone numbers, and addresses

resource.name: BikeRacks
resource.description: Locations and characteristics of bicycle racks throughout Davidson County, including Metro-owned racks, some privately-owned racks, and art installation racks.

resource.name: Direct Appropriation Awards
resource.description: This dataset contains all the agencies that are awarded Direct Appropriation funds by the Metropolitan Government for the year ended June 30, 2009 to current.  This dataset is updated on an annual schedule.
columns_description: Name of agency that was awarded direct appropriation funds.
Amount of direct appropriation funds awarded to the agency.
The data is for the fiscal year ending June 30 of the applicable year.
Description of services provided by the agency.
